name: Little Thief's Great Disguise
description:
This game was made for the LTGD LTGJ game jam. 
You'll be commanding a group of thieves to steal some treasure for money. Dress them up for the job and send them on the mission.

Move with WASD or the arrow keys.

Pick up the clothing pieces to dress up the little thieves and bring them to the correct mission. 

You have 30 seconds to complete a day of heists. After 30 seconds the level resets and you can go again.
